title: Shook Magazine FONT ID
content:
Looking for a font ID for the Bright Orange “SHOOK” logo. Looks pretty custom, but maybe it was based off a font?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709013236im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/shookmagazi_issue1~~~_101b_5326.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [shookmagazi\_issue1~~~\_101b.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709013236/http:/typophile.com/files/shookmagazi_issue1~~~_101b.jpg) | 30.21 KB |

 [‹ Tricho logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709013236/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42850 "Go to previous forum topic") [Similar to Franklin Gothic but what is it? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709013236/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42853 "Go to next forum topic")
author: SKUMATIK

comments.content:
Looks a bit like Alpha Bloc Sculpture, have a look on: [http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/font\_bureau/alpha\_bloc\_sculpture/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709013236/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/font_bureau/alpha_bloc_sculpture/ "http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/font\_bureau/alpha\_bloc\_sculpture/")

maybe a starting point...
excellent starting point, everything works except for that k....guess that one is custom made. thanks a lot!!!
